en.title: Happy Birthday
en.text: On this special day, we wish you a birthday filled with joy, love, and unforgettable moments. May this new year bring you success, health, and happiness. Enjoy your day to the fullest!

en.text: Happy Catalonia Day! May this September 11th be a day of celebration of our identity and culture. Long live Catalonia!

en.text: Happy Yule, may the light and warmth of the winter solstice illuminate your home and your heart.

en.title: Happy new year
en.text: Happy New Year! I wish you a year filled with happiness, health, and prosperity. May this new year bring you many joys and opportunities to fulfill your dreams. Here's to a year filled with success and unforgettable moments!

en.title: Good erasmus
en.text: Congratulations on your Erasmus! We're so happy you're going to be living this experience. Enjoy every moment, learn a lot, and meet new people. We wish you the best on this incredible adventure!

en.text: Welcome back from your Erasmus! It's great to have you back after this incredible experience. I hope you enjoyed it and learned a lot. I wish you the best in this new phase.
